task.title: Creating Schedule Items
task.abstract: Conference style events offer breakout sessions within an event that allow users to tailor the event itinerary to suit their interests. Staff users and Community Portal users can view and select the created schedule items in the backend Shopping Cart and the Community Portal. Schedule items are only available for Conference style events.

ul.li: If required, Set up Deferred Revenue

li.note: System Admins or staff users must Enable Schedule Items on the related Event Category for recurring events. Otherwise, Enable Schedule Items on the Event record for one-time events.

step.cmd: Click the New Schedule Item button on the Schedule related list on the Event record.
Enter the Schedule Item Name, Start Date/Time, End Date/Time, and Price fields.
step.info: The Price field can have a value of "0" or a value greater than "0". Default is "0".

step.cmd: Enter the Display Name, Description, and Image URL.
Enter the Capacity and check the Is Active checkbox. Click Save.
step.info: If the Capacity field is left blank, then the schedule items will display as "Full" in the Agenda Builder and are unavailable for registration.

taskbody.result: Creating a schedule item automatically creates an Item record and a default Price Rule. System Admins and staff users can create an additional custom price rule by navigating to the Price Rules related list on the Schedule Item record and clicking the New Price Rule button.

ul.li: Attach optional Registration Questions to the schedule item through the Registration Interview lookup
Enable Access Permissions to restrict visibility to a target audience
